channel.title: Background is messed up

item.title: Background is messed up
item.dc:creator: @Distryct Distryct
item.description:
@Distryct wrote:

hello everybody actually :(.

i’ve done this tutorial : [URL=http://“http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/403814-custom-login-screen.html”]http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/403814-custom-login-screen.html[/URL]

when i start my client it looks like :

i am using simplicity v2’s client
i’ve noticed he is using a sprite to replace his background so he removed almost everything in the method logo drawlogo

private void drawLogo() { byte abyte0[] = titleStreamLoader.getDataForName("title.dat"); new Sprite(abyte0, this); System.gc(); }

how he loaded the sprites :

[QUOTE]

  1.         backgroundWorld1 = new Sprite("world1");

  2.  backgroundWorld1.drawSprite(0, 0);

  3.         backgroundWorld1 = null;

  4.         private Sprite backgroundWorld1;

[/QUOTE]

idk what to do:(

everything worked fine except for the background:(:(:(:(:(:(:(

Read full topic
